name: Stupidly Realistic Wolf Simulator Deluxe
description:
Installation:

1. Download zip file

2. Extract to any folder

3. Run the file named "StupidlyRealisticWolfSimulatorDeluxe.exe" in the "build" folder.

4. Allow permission to use the file (Windows will ask)

Notes:

Remember this is only a prototype, some bugs may occur, and certain functionality might not be available, and is a WIP.

Credits:

Amit Thapa - Programming, Multiplayer, Gameplay

Keith Leong - UI, Gameplay, Programming

Reece Beckman-Sawyer - Programming, Gameplay, Multiplayer, Project Management

Special Thanks:
